Message:
Since then, I heard many rumors
about Her Holiness’s infamy.

Those who had adored her
began to leave,

and some were even executed
as a warning to others.

I’m sure there’ll come a day
when you face punishment.

A day when all your suppressed
hatred erupts, and someone comes
trying to strike you down.

If that’s what’s bound to happen,
I’ll share the burden of
your sins with you.

If I hadn’t met you,
Your Holiness,
I would’ve died in
the middle of nowhere.

That’s why, ever since that day,
my life has belonged to you.
My loyalty to you is unwavering.

Even if the entire world
were to condemn you as evil,
I alone will continue
serving you as your knight.
Even if this is the wrong path,

if you choose to go down it,
I’ll go with you until we both
fall into the abyss...!

Even if my mind
has been corrupted,
this is my code of chivalry!

With doubts still
lingering in my heart,
I raised the Church’s
blood-stained flag!

“To all who dare
oppose Her Holiness,
what awaits you...is death!”
